. It is a nice city with laid-back atmosphere and lovely old pedestrian street, 2 hours bus ride from Xiaguan south-west bus station.

About 10 km from the city there is a protected area on the mountain, Weibao Shan with old Taoist temples (admission Y50). Good birding on the mountain. Forest below the protected area is replaced with eucaliptus trees.

value: wikipedia:Weishan Yi and Hui Autonomous County
